column6: Thanks to an all-out battle between gods and Earthlings, our planet has been wiped clean by the Scarlet Centurion! Coulson and his team have one chance to leap back in time and save the world--but to do so, they'll have to wage war on Asgard!
column8: | artist:Mike Perkins | penciller (cover):Julian Totino Tedesco | writer:Mark Waid
